text: My daughter has been attending MapleBear hillview since 18months. I know the teachers always try to make learning fun and also focus on their social emotional wellbeing. Hence, she looks forward to school and has developed good friendships. As parents, the daily updates within the app and easy engagement with teachers give us peace of mind.
One of the best preschools , very warm and caring teachers . My daughter loved her 4 years from nursery to senior kindergarten .
My son started preschool at maplebear and he was very happy to go to school. He loves the teachers and the environment there.

I just enrolled my kid here , she love her teachers , both English and Chinese.
Every teacher know the name of every child here, You can feel the caring and loving once you stepped into center . I am very confidence with the teacher here , even my daughter still got crying every morning . Teachers do daily update to parents , so you can know what Is the activities everyday, and how ur kids doing in childcare .
No regrets enrolled my kid here .hopefully new principal keep it up and even can do better ;)

Maplebear Hillview was a wonderful preschool for my two children. My elder child was there from K1 to K2, and the younger one just graduated after spending more than four years there. We had the pleasure of having Ms Pearlyn as their form teacher from K1 to K2; she was nurturing and kind, and brought out the best in the children. The other teachers who taught my children, such as Song Laoshi, Ms Pam and Ms Ella, also left an indelible mark on us with their patience and care.

The K2 Graduation Concerts were also remarkable as the teachers conceptualised, scripted, directed, designed and produced everything in-house. From the elaborate stage performances pre-Covid to a movie musical in pandemic times, the teachers demonstrated creativity in showcasing the young talents under their care. Thank you, dear Maplebear Hillview teachers, for the memorable experience!
